items.sentence: They're more scared of us than we are of them.
I'll continue doing this for as long as I can.
Tom didn't give any reason for not doing that.
You need to register for the event in advance.
I don't know how much longer I can stand this.
I wish you hadn't told the story to my mother.
I won't be able to talk Tom out of doing that.
I'll give Tom your message when he comes back.
I won't start the meeting until Tom gets here.
I've been working as a waiter for a long time.
I don't know whether Tom will ever forgive me.
Tom didn't want to hurt his friends' feelings.
I'm going to be your French teacher next year.
Tom is the one that told me to read this book.
Tom is the one who suggested I read this book.
Tom is afraid that he'll hurt Mary's feelings.
Tom is the only boy Mary invited to her party.
Tom was the only one that knew where Mary was.
Tom was the one who told me he had to do that.
Either stay here by yourself, or come with us.
